name: Young Imperial Dragon
movement: swim 40 ft., walk 40 ft., fly 80 ft.
description: A large, agile dragon embodying aquatic traits, with a strong physique and vibrant scales, able to effortlessly navigate both water and air.
memorable: Its ability to unleash devastating lightning breath and manipulate the battlefield with innate spells makes it a fearsome encounter.
goals: Typically hunts in aquatic environments and seeks to assert dominance in its territory.
relations: May be encountered alongside other dragons or aquatic creatures; could have ties with elemental or storm beings.
environment: Often found in areas near water, such as lakes, rivers, or coastal regions.
strengths: Immune to lightning and thunder damage, high hit points, and effective battlefield control via spellcasting.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to certain types of magic and relies heavily on physical attacks.
attacks: Uses a multiattack that includes a powerful bite and sharp claws, capable of devastating damage.
most_powerful_ability: Lightning Breath can inflict massive damage in a single attack, affecting multiple enemies in a line.
senses: Blindsight up to 30 feet and a high passive Perception of 20 allow it to detect threats effectively.
skills: Proficient in Insight and Perception, making it adept at reading its surroundings and noticing hidden threats.
additional_information: Amphibious, able to breathe both air and water.
Innate spellcasting that enhances its battlefield control.
Strong physical attributes including a high Strength score.
Can maneuver effectively in both water and air.
Possesses resistance against physical and debilitating effects through high Constitution.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting based on Charisma; can cast Fog Cloud three times a day, and Control Water, Gust of Wind, Stinking Cloud once per day each.
test_queries: powerful aquatic dragon with lightning breath
large dragon that can breathe underwater
young dragon that controls water and storms
formidable creature with devastating breath attack
